marklogic.body: This is sad as is most of the scene. There is no true love between them. They can model and make millions as talking heads in mostly animated movies, but they will never be happy. They are empty inside, looking for that which will fill them. Only God can do that. So do not envy them. Feel sorry for them. The poorest homeless person sitting in his Spot playing the harmonica for change is richer and happier than any of them. Ask Whitney Houston nwhat her fame Gained her.
